thread.title: BRIEF-Shawcor Announces Contract To Provide Pipe Coating Services For Offshore Qatar Pipeline Project

title: BRIEF-Shawcor Announces Contract To Provide Pipe Coating Services For Offshore Qatar Pipeline Project

organizations.name: provide pipe coating services for offshore qatar pipeline project
services for offshore qatar pipeline project reuters

text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Shawcor Ltd:
* SHAWCOR ANNOUNCES CONTRACT TO PROVIDE PIPE COATING SERVICES FOR AN OFFSHORE QATAR PIPELINE PROJECT
* SHAWCOR LTD - ‍PIPE COATING DIVISION RECEIVED CONDITIONAL CONTRACT WITH VALUE IN EXCESS OF C$50 MILLION FROM EEW GROUP​
* SHAWCOR - CONTRACT WILL BE EXECUTED IN CO‘S COATING FACILITIES IN ITALY, AND IS EXPECTED TO COMMENCE IN Q3 2018 AND TO BE COMPLETED BY Q1 2020 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
